## Welcome to Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

- Data science is an exciting discipline that allows you to turn raw data into understanding, insight, and knowledge. 

- We're going to learn to do this in a `tidy` way -- more on that later!

- This is a course on introduction to Exploratory Data Analysis, an important step in the Data Science lifecycle

![](img/dsa_lfcycle.svg){fig-align="center" width="200%"}


## What is EDA?


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%" style="font-size: 45px" }

> EDA involves **investigating and summarizing** data sets to **uncover patterns**, **spot anomalies**, and **test hypotheses**, using statistical graphics and other data visualization methods. 

*This process helps us to understand underlying trends in data before applying more complex analytical techniques.*

:::

::: {.column width="5%" }
